page.title: 19LIFE STYLES _SHOPPING
page.content: There are various shops in Northleach situated around the square. There are shops for the housewife but not many for the younger generation and tourists. They are open from Monday to Saturday, but Thursday is half_day closing. Recently a bypass has been constructed to prevent heavy traffic through the town.A few shopkeepers' trade has been badly affected. An average packet of cigarettes costs 1.15, bread costs 46p a sliced loaf, 1/2 pound of cheese costs 70p, lard 36p and a good bottle of whisky costs 7.99. There are about 11 shops including a post office, two butchers, a few hardware shops , a pharmacy which sells a few novelties. Thursdays,Fridays and Saturdays are the busiest days in Northleach. A few shops are open on Sunday mornings.
